text: The statue of Jaroslav Hašek is an outdoor monument and equestrian statue by Karel Nepraš and Karolína Neprašová, installed at Prokopovo náměstí in the Žižkov district of Prague, Czech Republic. The sculpture was installed in 2005, having been completed by Nepraš's daughter Karolína after his death. It is located in an area where Hašek lived during writing of his famous novel The Good Soldier Švejk. ==See also== * 2005 in art * List of equestrian statues ==References== ==External links== * Category:2005 establishments in the Czech Republic Category:2005 sculptures Category:Equestrian statues in the Czech Republic Category:Jaroslav Hašek Category:Monuments and memorials in Prague Category:Outdoor sculptures in Prague Category:Statues in Prague Category:Statues of writers Category:Žižkov
title: Statue of Jaroslav Hašek
